citation.article-title: Proposals of Sphingomonas paucimobilis gen. nov. and comb. nov., Sphingomonas parapaucimobilis sp. nov., Sphingomonas yanoikuyae sp. nov., Sphingomonas adhaesiva sp. nov., Sphingomonas capsulata comb. nov., and two genospecies of the genus Sphingomonas.

p.s: Description of Sphingomonas parapaucimobilis sp. nov.

Sphingomonas parapaucimobilis (para. pauci. mobilis. Gr. prep. para alongside of, resembling; M.L. paucimobilis specific epithet; M.L. gen. n. parapaucimobilis intended to mean like the species of S. paucimobilis)
Cellular and colonial characteristics are similar to those of S. paucimobilis.
Blackening of lead acetate paper suspended over Kligler iron agar is positive.
Able to grow and alkalinize Simmons' citrate medium.
Nucleotide sequence of 16s rRNA at 157 positions (1220-1376) of the type and three strains of this species is completely the same as that of S. paucimobilis.
G+C contents of DNA is 64-65 mol%.
